00030 void CascadeClassifier::Clear()
00031 {
00032         count = 0;
00033         delete[] ac; ac=NULL;

00036 CascadeClassifier& CascadeClassifier::operator=(const CascadeClassifier& source)
00037 {
00038         Clear();
00039         count = source.count;
00040         ac = new AdaBoostClassifier[gMaxNumNodes]; ASSERT(ac!=NULL);
00041         for(int i=0;i<count;i++) ac[i] = source.ac[i];
00042         return *this;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void CascadeClassifier::ReadFromFile(ifstream& f)
00046 {
00047         Clear();
00048         f>>count; f.ignore(256,'\n');
00049         ac = new AdaBoostClassifier[gMaxNumNodes]; ASSERT(ac!=NULL);
00050         for(int i=0;i<count;i++) ac[i].ReadFromFile(f);
00051 }
00052 
00053 void CascadeClassifier::WriteToFile(ofstream& f) const
00054 {
00055         f<<count<<endl;
00056         for(int i=0;i<count;i++) ac[i].WriteToFile(f);
00057 }

00068 void CascadeClassifier::DrawResults(IntImage& image,const vector<CRect>& results) const
00069 {
00070         int i;
00071         unsigned int k;
00072         int x1,x2,y1,y2;
00073 
00074         for(k=0;k<results.size();k++)
00075         {
00076                 y1 = (results[k].top>=0)?results[k].top:0; 
00077                 y1 = (results[k].top<image.height)?results[k].top:(image.height-1);
00078                 y2 = (results[k].bottom>=0)?results[k].bottom:0;
00079                 y2 = (results[k].bottom<image.height)?results[k].bottom:(image.height-1);
00080                 x1 = (results[k].left>=0)?results[k].left:0;
00081                 x1 = (results[k].left<image.width)?results[k].left:(image.width-1);
00082                 x2 = (results[k].right>=0)?results[k].right:0;
00083                 x2 = (results[k].right<image.width)?results[k].right:(image.width-1);   
00084                 for(i=y1;i<=y2;i++) 
00085                 {
00086                         image.data[i][x1] = 0;
00087                         image.data[i][x2] = 0;
00088                 }
00089                 for(i=x1;i<=x2;i++)
00090                 {
00091                         image.data[y1][i] = 0;
00092                         image.data[y2][i] = 0;
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 }

00097 const int CascadeClassifier::ApplyImagePatch(const IntImage& im) const
00098 {
00099         for(int i=0;i<count;i++) if(ac[i].ApplyImagePatch(im)==0) return 0;
00100         return 1;
00101 }

00103 void CascadeClassifier::ApplyOriginalSize(IntImage& original,const CString filename) 
00104 {
00105         IntImage procface;
00106         IntImage image,square;
00107         REAL sq,ex,value;
00108         int result;
00109         CRect rect;
00110         REAL ratio;
00111         vector<CRect> results;
00112 
00113         procface.Copy(original);
00114         ratio = 1.0;
00115         results.clear();
00116         REAL paddedsize = REAL(1)/REAL((gSx+1)*(gSy+1));
00117         while((procface.height>gSx+1) && (procface.width>gSy+1))
00118         {
00119                 procface.CalcSquareAndIntegral(square,image);
00120                 for(int i=0,size_x=image.height-gSx;i<size_x;i+=1)
00121                         for(int j=0,size_y=image.width-gSy;j<size_y;j+=1)
00122                         {
00123                                 ex = image.data[i+gSx][j+gSy]+image.data[i][j]-image.data[i+gSx][j]-image.data[i][j+gSy];
00124                                 if(ex<gMean_Min || ex>gMean_Max) continue;
00125                                 sq = square.data[i+gSx][j+gSy]+square.data[i][j]-square.data[i+gSx][j]-square.data[i][j+gSy];
00126                                 if(sq<gSq_Min) continue;
00127                                 ex *= paddedsize;
00128                                 ex = ex * ex;
00129                                 sq *= paddedsize;
00130                                 sq = sq - ex;
00131                                 ASSERT(sq>=0);
00132                                 if(sq>0) sq = sqrt(sq); else sq = 1.0;
00133                                 if(sq<gVar_Min) continue;
00134                                 result = 1;
00135                                 for(int k=0;k<count;k++)
00136                                 {
00137                                         value = 0.0;
00138                                         for(int t=0,size=ac[k].count;t<size;t++)
00139                                         {
00140                                                 REAL f1 = 0;
00141                                                 REAL** p = image.data + i;
00142                                                 SimpleClassifier& s = ac[k].scs[t];
00143 
00144                                                 switch(s.type)
00145                                                 {
00146                                                         case 0:
00147                                                                 f1 =   p[s.x1][j+s.y3] - p[s.x1][j+s.y1] + p[s.x3][j+s.y3] - p[s.x3][j+s.y1]
00148                                                                         + REAL(2)*(p[s.x2][j+s.y1] - p[s.x2][j+s.y3]);
00149                                                                 break;
00150                                                         case 1:
00151                                                                 f1 =   p[s.x3][j+s.y1] + p[s.x3][j+s.y3] - p[s.x1][j+s.y1] - p[s.x1][j+s.y3]
00152                                                                         + REAL(2)*(p[s.x1][j+s.y2] - p[s.x3][j+s.y2]);
00153                                                                 break;
00154                                                         case 2:
00155                                                                 f1 =   p[s.x1][j+s.y1] - p[s.x1][j+s.y3] + p[s.x4][j+s.y3] - p[s.x4][j+s.y1]
00156                                                                         + REAL(3)*(p[s.x2][j+s.y3] - p[s.x2][j+s.y1] + p[s.x3][j+s.y1]  - p[s.x3][j+s.y3]);
00157                                                                 break;
00158                                                         case 3:
00159                                                                 f1 =   p[s.x1][j+s.y1] - p[s.x1][j+s.y4] + p[s.x3][j+s.y4] - p[s.x3][j+s.y1]
00160                                                                         + REAL(3)*(p[s.x3][j+s.y2] - p[s.x3][j+s.y3] + p[s.x1][j+s.y3] - p[s.x1][j+s.y2]);
00161                                                                 break;
00162                                                         case 4:
00163                                                                 f1 =   p[s.x1][j+s.y1] + p[s.x1][j+s.y3] + p[s.x3][j+s.y1] + p[s.x3][j+s.y3]
00164                                                                         - REAL(2)*(p[s.x2][j+s.y1] + p[s.x2][j+s.y3] + p[s.x1][j+s.y2] + p[s.x3][j+s.y2])
00165                                                                         + REAL(4)*p[s.x2][j+s.y2];
00166                                                                 break;
00167                                                         default:
00168 #ifndef DEBUG 
00169                                                                 __assume(0);
00170 #else
00171                                                                 ;
00172 #endif
00173                                                 }
00174                                                 if(s.parity!=0)
00175                                                         if(f1<sq*s.thresh)
00176                                                                 value += ac[k].alphas[t];
00177                                                         else ;
00178                                                 else
00179                                                         if(f1>=sq*s.thresh)
00180                                                                 value += ac[k].alphas[t];
00181                                                         else ;
00182                                         }
00183                                         if(value<ac[k].thresh) 
00184                                         {
00185                                                 result = 0;
00186                                                 break;
00187                                         }
00188                                 }
00189                                 if(result!=0) 
00190                                 {
00191                                         const REAL r = 1.0/ratio;
00192                                         rect.left = (LONG)(j*r);rect.top = (LONG)(i*r);
00193                                         rect.right = (LONG)((j+gSy)*r);rect.bottom = (LONG)((i+gSx)*r);
00194                                         results.push_back(rect);
00195                                 }
00196                         }
00197                 ratio = ratio * REAL(0.8);
00198                 procface.Resize(image,REAL(0.8));
00199                 SwapIntImage(procface,image);
00200         }
00201 
00202         gTotal_fp += results.size();
00203 
00204         PostProcess(results,2);
00205         PostProcess(results,0);
00206         DrawResults(original,results);
00207 //      original.Save(filename+"_result.JPG");
00208 }
00209 
00210 inline int SizeOfRect(const CRect& rect)
00211 {
00212         return rect.Height()*rect.Width();
00213 }
00214 
00215 void PostProcess(vector<CRect>& result,const int combine_min)
00216 {
00217         vector<CRect> res1;
00218         vector<CRect> resmax;
00219         vector<int> res2;
00220         bool yet;
00221         CRect rectInter;
00222         
00223         for(unsigned int i=0,size_i=result.size();i<size_i;i++)
00224         {
00225                 yet = false;
00226                 CRect& result_i = result[i];
00227                 for(unsigned int j=0,size_r=res1.size();j<size_r;j++)
00228                 {
00229                         CRect& resmax_j = resmax[j];
00230                         if(rectInter.IntersectRect(result_i,resmax_j))
00231                         {
00232                                 if(
00233                                         SizeOfRect(rectInter)>0.6*SizeOfRect(result_i) 
00234                                  && SizeOfRect(rectInter)>0.6*SizeOfRect(resmax_j)
00235                                   )
00236                                 {
00237                                         CRect& res1_j = res1[j];
00238                                         resmax_j.UnionRect(resmax_j,result_i);
00239                                         res1_j.bottom += result_i.bottom;
00240                                         res1_j.top += result_i.top;
00241                                         res1_j.left += result_i.left;
00242                                         res1_j.right += result_i.right;
00243                                         res2[j]++;
00244                                         yet = true;
00245                                         break;
00246                                 }
00247                         }
00248                 }
00249                 if(yet==false)
00250                 {
00251                         res1.push_back(result_i);
00252                         resmax.push_back(result_i);
00253                         res2.push_back(1);
00254                 }
00255         }
00256 
00257         for(unsigned int i=0,size=res1.size();i<size;i++)
00258         {
00259                 const int count = res2[i];
00260                 CRect& res1_i = res1[i];
00261                 res1_i.top /= count;
00262                 res1_i.bottom /= count;
00263                 res1_i.left /= count;
00264                 res1_i.right /= count;
00265         }
00266 
00267         result.clear();
00268         for(unsigned int i=0,size=res1.size();i<size;i++) 
00269                 if(res2[i]>combine_min)
00270                         result.push_back(res1[i]);
00271 }

00273 void CascadeClassifier::ApplyOriginalSizeForInputBoosting(const CString filename,int& pointer) const
00274 {
00275         IntImage procface;
00276         IntImage image,square;
00277         REAL sq,ex,value;
00278         int result;
00279         CRect rect;
00280         REAL ratio;
00281 
00282         procface.Load(filename);
00283         if(procface.height <=0 || procface.width<=0) return;
00284         ratio = 1.0;
00285         REAL paddedsize = REAL(1)/REAL((gSx+1)*(gSy+1));
00286         while((procface.height>gSx+1) && (procface.width>gSy+1))
00287         {
00288                 procface.CalcSquareAndIntegral(square,image);
00289                 for(int i=0,size_x=image.height-gSx;i<size_x;i+=bootstrap_increment[bootstrap_level])
00290                         for(int j=0,size_y=image.width-gSy;j<size_y;j+=bootstrap_increment[bootstrap_level])
00291                         {
00292                                 ex = image.data[i+gSx][j+gSy]+image.data[i][j]-image.data[i+gSx][j]-image.data[i][j+gSy];
00293                                 if(ex<gMean_Min || ex>gMean_Max) continue;
00294                                 sq = square.data[i+gSx][j+gSy]+square.data[i][j]-square.data[i+gSx][j]-square.data[i][j+gSy];
00295                                 if(sq<gSq_Min) continue;
00296                                 ex *= paddedsize;
00297                                 ex = ex * ex;
00298                                 sq *= paddedsize;
00299                                 sq = sq - ex;
00300                                 ASSERT(sq>=0);
00301                                 if(sq>0) sq = sqrt(sq); else sq = 1.0;
00302                                 if(sq<gVar_Min) continue;
00303                                 result = 1;
00304                                 for(int k=0;k<count;k++)
00305                                 {
00306                                         value = 0.0;
00307                                         for(int t=0,size=ac[k].count;t<size;t++)
00308                                                 value += (ac[k].alphas[t]*ac[k].scs[t].Apply(ac[k].scs[t].GetOneFeatureTranslation(image.data+i,j)/sq));
00309                                         if(value<ac[k].thresh) 
00310                                         {
00311                                                 result = 0;
00312                                                 break;
00313                                         }
00314                                 }
00315                                 if(result==1)
00316                                 {
00317                                         for(int k=1;k<=gSx;k++)
00318                                                 for(int t=1;t<=gSy;t++)
00319                                                         gTrainSet[pointer].data[k][t]=image.data[i+k][j+t]-image.data[i+k][j]-image.data[i][j+t]+image.data[i][j];
00320                                         pointer++;
00321                                         if(pointer==gTotalCount) return;
00322                                 }
00323                         }
00324                 ratio = ratio * bootstrap_resizeratio[bootstrap_level];
00325                 procface.Resize(image,bootstrap_resizeratio[bootstrap_level]);
00326                 SwapIntImage(procface,image);
00327         }
00328 }

00330 void AppendAdaBoostClassifier(const AdaBoostClassifier& ada)
00331 {
00332         CascadeClassifier cas;
00333         ifstream f;
00334         ofstream of;
00335 
00336         f.open(gCascade_Filename);
00337         cas.ReadFromFile(f);
00338         f.close();
00339 
00340         cas.ac[cas.count] = ada;
00341         cas.count++;
00342 
00343         of.open(gCascade_Filename);
00344         cas.WriteToFile(of);
00345         of.close();
00346 }
